titles.title: JUSTICE Act
Justice for the Unprotected against Sexually Transmitted Infections among the Confined and Exposed Act
To reduce the spread of sexually transmitted infections in correctional facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary
